roles.name: Sailor
roles.firstNightReminder: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
roles.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

roles.name: Snake Charmer
roles.firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
roles.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

roles.name: Cult Leader
roles.firstNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
roles.otherNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
roles.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

roles.name: Innkeeper
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

roles.name: Gambler
roles.otherNightReminder: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

roles.name: Monk
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

roles.name: Gossip
roles.otherNightReminder: If the Gossip’s public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
roles.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

roles.name: Soldier
roles.ability: You are safe from the Demon.

roles.name: Fool
roles.ability: The first time you die, you don't.

roles.name: Pacifist
roles.ability: Executed good players might not die.

roles.name: Tea Lady
roles.ability: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.

roles.name: Mayor
roles.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

roles.name: Cannibal
roles.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

roles.name: Acrobat
roles.otherNightReminder: If a good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat player dies.
roles.ability: Each night*, if either good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, you die.

roles.name: Tinker
roles.ability: You might die at any time.

roles.name: Klutz
roles.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

roles.name: Drunk
roles.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

roles.name: Godfather
roles.firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
roles.otherNightReminder: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.
roles.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

roles.name: Poisoner
roles.firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
roles.otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

roles.name: Devil's Advocate
roles.firstNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
roles.otherNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
roles.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

roles.name: Spy
roles.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
roles.otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
roles.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

roles.name: Al-Hadikhia
roles.otherNightReminder: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.
roles.ability: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
